insert.foreach: into asset(adate, income, icontent, expense, econtent, num, cnum, id) values (to_date(#{map.adate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{map.income}, #{map.icontent}, #{map.expense}, #{map.econtent}, extractvalue(dbms_xmlgen.getxmltype('select asset_seq.nextval - 1 from dual'), '//text()'), calendar_seq.currval, #{map.id})

into asset(adate, income, icontent, expense, econtent, num, cnum, id) values (to_date(#{map.adate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{map.income}, #{map.icontent}, #{map.expense}, #{map.econtent}, extractvalue(dbms_xmlgen.getxmltype('select asset_seq.nextval - 1 from dual'), '//text()'), #{map.num}, #{map.id})

mapper.update: update asset set income = #{income}, icontent = #{icontent}, expense = #{expense}, econtent = #{econtent} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from asset where id=#{id} and adate between #{first} and #{last} order by adate asc
